additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Reconstituted Grapefruit Juice (30%), Sugar, Acidity Regulators (Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate), Vitamin C, Natural Flavour, Colour (Carotenes).

additionalProperty.name: Country Of Origin
additionalProperty.value: Made in United States of America with local and imported ingredients

description: Made with ruby red grapefruits, which have a unique deep red colour and vibrant taste, plus 100% daily requirement of Antioxidant Vitamin C.
name: Ruby Red Grapefruit Juice
